list_definition.definition: to or at a distance from the person speaking or the person or thing spoken about

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He lives three miles away (from the town)
She turned away so that he would not see her tears.

list_definition.definition: (of a football match etc) not on the home ground

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The team is playing away this weekend
